name: Arcane Whisperer
text_description: The Arcane Whisperer is a deceptive entity that uses its influence to weaken enemies. Whenever an opponent casts a card, Arcane Whisperer reduces its attack by -1 for the turn.
illustration_description: A shadowy figure shrouded in an otherworldly violet cloak stands on an ancient rune-engraved stone platform. Its eyes glow purple, and it holds a staff with a crystal orb that emanates mysterious arcane energy. The scene is set against a backdrop of swirling, nocturnal mists.
